## FAQ

### What data sources does Explo support?

Explo currently supports the following data sources:

</CardGroup>

We are constantly building out support for more data sources, so if you are using a database not listed, please feel free to reach out to [support@explo.co](mailto:support@explo.co).

If your data is stored in a 3rd party application such as Shopify, Stripe, Salesforce, etc., we partner with ETL providers and would be glad to help load your data into a database or warehouse.

For clients using MongoDB, Aurora, or other no-SQL databases, you can leverage a tool such as Rockset or load your data into a SQL DB. Please reach out to our team and we'd be glad to walk you through that process.

### Other frequently asked

<AccordionGroup>

<Accordion title="Does Explo store any of our data?">

Explo doesn't store any of our customer's data. We query your database or warehouse each time the dashboard is loaded.

</Accordion>

<Accordion title="How is Explo different from other BI tools?">

Explo is focused specifically on embedded analytics. It's designed so that you can connect your data, and embed a dashboard for your customers in a single day.

We are a fully white-labeled product that fits perfectly into your existing application, and we handle all the permissioning so your customers only see their own data.

</Accordion>

<Accordion title="Can we use Explo for internal analytics?">

Explo is built for embedded, customer-facing analytics first, you can however use our platform to build out dashboards to view and share internally as well.

</Accordion>

</AccordionGroup>
